author: Alex O'Connor
description:
For early, ad-free access to videos, and to support the channel, subscribe to my Substack: https://www.alexoconnor.com

To donate to my PayPal (thank you): http://www.paypal.me/cosmicskeptic

 - VIDEO NOTES

Philip Goff is a British author, panpsychist philosopher, and professor at Durham University whose research focuses on philosophy of mind and consciousness. Specifically, it focuses on how consciousness can be part of the scientific worldview.

 - LINKS

Philip's Substack: https://philipgoff.substack.com/
Philip's Website: https://philipgoffphilosophy.com/
Philip's X: https://x.com/Philip_Goff

Buy "Why? The Purpose of the Universe": https://amzn.to/4oMxi4W

Buy "Galileo's Error: Foundations for a New Science of Consciousness": https://amzn.to/4r25Dyt

 - TIMESTAMPS

0:00 - Why Philip Became a "Heretical Christian"
7:13 - Panpsychism and the Fine-Tuning Argument
18:46 - Why God’s Power is Limited
30:10 - The Problem of Suffering
42:53 - Non-Western Religious Positions
48:34 - What
title: Why I Am a Heretical Christian - Philip Goff
